page.title: 01Horningsham Village
page.content: {Horningsham}is a small village situated on the{Longleat Estate mid-way between the towns of{Frome}and {Warminster.} The Village is in the County of {Wiltshire. The original village of{Horningsham disappeared long ago and the present is made up from five different hamlets which have come together under that name. Most of working population is employed by the{Longleat Estate}in the house, Safari Park or the forestry. The Village has a Church, Chapel, School, Shop and Post Office, Hall, Public House and a Filling Station. There is a small group of houses that do not now belong to the Estate. Various activities take place including Cricket, a Luncheon Club, Youth Club, W.I. and Adventures.
